channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 51 - 61 Hazel Way, Lobleys Drive, Brockworth, GL3 4GL, 15th July
item.description:
The five trees lining the grass verge of Hazel Way have become overgrown, extending into the road and are now encroaching on the pathway at head height. They are also starting to hang over into the gardens of the properties along the street. These trees significantly obstruct visibility for pedestrians at the two nearby crossings and completely obscure the 'NO HGV' sign in the crescent, potentially contributing to the ongoing issue of lorries mistakenly using Lobley's bridge which is not suitable for HGV's. On the opposite side of the street, the trees have very recently had their canopies lifted, thus significantly improving visibility for drivers and pedestrians. Applying the same treatment to the five trees on Hazel Way's side would further enhance visibility for everyone and improve road safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructed PROW + Dangerous Road., 15th July
item.description:
The public footpath at this location is all but obstructed by a very overgrown hedge. Believe it or not there is supposed to be a gap in the hedge behind those people in the photo. One can just about force your way through the hedge but you almost fall into the very busy road when you do. The hedge needs cutting right back and the gab needs reinstating ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees on boundry, 15th July
item.description:
Trees overhanging our property by at least 8 to 10 feet.Affecting the growing and cultivation of the gardens. The trees need trimming back to the boundary. Age makes us unable to trim them. They are council Property. Thanks 153/155 Sussex Gardens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
